title: Consistent above-average ping
body:
http://i.imgur.com/Z9rUMMp.png

Traceroute shows that the problem is at riotdirect.net, which is the only reason I bothered posting this here.

I usually have around 60 ping but today it's been up above 200 consistently.
I guess worth mentioning my ISP is Frontier

replies.body: Based on this, it looks like you're running into issues as soon as your ISP begins to route your connection.  You can also download [WinMTR ](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/)for a better overview of your routing, but make sure to run it to 104.160.131.1 for about 5 minutes.  Attach your results to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and our tech team can take a deeper look with you.  We'll get back to you!
